1.title: You Ain't Got No Lines
1.plot: Malik Washington, a Stand-in for Will Smith on the network TV show, The Last Murder has a shocking dream while at work. How hard is it, to focus while on the job?

2.title: Give Thanks
2.plot: Malik Washington is the lead male stand-in for Will Smith on the TV show, The Last Murder. Eboni Jackson is smitten with the director, Tawan Pluralton. Malik Washington invites his background actor friends over for Thanksgiving dinner and the party starts.

3.title: Christmas Carol Lip-synch Battle
3.plot: Malik Washington distraught by his mother's sarcoma cancer diagnosis, needs to escape. He attends Eboni Jackson's Christmas party. Who will win the Christmas Carol lip-synch Battle.

4.title: Nominations, Fights and Fitness
4.plot: Malik Washington and his gang of misfit background actors learn that they are nominated and will be attending the 2018 Background Awards Show, sponsored by the Background Extras Atmosphere Artist Association. Eboni is unsettled by her so called, "friends" lack of support.

5.title: Girls Run the World
5.plot: With Malik Washington being nominated for the Best Male Stand-in of the Year Award, everyone prepares for the 2018 BEAAA ( Background Extras Atmosphere Artists Association) Awards Show.

6.title: Vote Them Out
6.plot: MALIK WASHINGTON is the regular stand-in for WILL SMITH on the network show, "The Last Murder." He and his gang of Background actors address the struggles and harsh reality of mass shootings, being BLACK and homelessness in AMERICA.

7.title: Don't Say It!
7.plot: Mariah-Yoncé Knowles, during a girls' night out, gets her Comedy on when Jordan Grant continues his quest to seriously date her. During a group life coaching session, given by Carmen Crystal Keys, Mariah-Yoncé and her girlfriends create an emotional bond.

8.title: Dying to Live and Love
8.plot: Background: Out of Focus is a showcase web-series. (Intended for Mature Audiences). Malik Washington flies to the east coast to witness his mother's death due to Sarcoma Cancer. Her gospel memorial opens his eyes to his dying community. Mariah-Yonce' Knowles gives in to love while they are all trying to figure out just how to live.

imdb.plot outline: This is the life of Malik Washington, a REAL Hollywood Background Actors. While struggling for his big acting break, he survives as a Stand-in for various celebrities. Witnessing the harsh treatment of "Extras" Malik and his gang of misfits learn that on Hollywood sets everyone is SOOO important and egos are a dime a dozen. Malik and his BG crew set out to break into Hollywood before it breaks them.
imdb.title: Background: Out of Focus
plot: Hollywood Background Actors,"Extras" are a blur in the background. Malik Washington realizes the show doesn't work without them. He and his misfits fight to change the "Background" game, exposing the dirt on Hollywood's behind the scenes.::Lonnie Henderson
